org.ow2.proactive.scheduler.common

Interface JobDescriptor

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Comparable<JobDescriptor>, Serializable

    @PublicAPI
public interface JobDescriptor
extends Serializable, Comparable<JobDescriptor>
    This class represents a job for the policy.
    Since:
    ProActive Scheduling 0.9

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Credentials getCredentials()
      Return the job owner encrypted credentials

      Returns the job owner name

      Return the list of paused tasks
      Map<TaskId,TaskDescriptor> getRunningTasks()
      Return the list of running tasks
      boolean hasChildren(TaskId taskId)
      Return true if the task represented by the given taskId has children, false if not.
      void restoreRunningTasks()
      Retrieve the persisted state of tasks and restore the state of tasks that are found running.
